name: Cuca
description: A senior lady who loved fetch, morning cuddles and belly rubs.

name: Rafa Di Zeo
description: Marked from birth and made for mayhem. Rafa's got the charm of a hooligan and the moves of a parkour pro.

name: Dante
description: A lovely senior, protective yet sweet, who can become a true companion through every moment.

name: Beto
description: A young boi who likes toys and reduce your stress with his company.

name: Kenway
description: A fearless tabby who's seen more than most. One eye, a whole lot of heart.

name: Élise
description: Sweet and sassy with a splash of color — Élise is a curious cuddlebug who's always ready for adventure.

name: Nina
description: Graceful, clever, and just a little mischievous — Nina is a curious explorer who's always ready for a sunny windowsill nap or a spontaneous zoomie session. She'll charm her way into your heart with one slow blink.

name: Murray
description: Murray's been around the block — and looks good doing it. Calm, clever, and always cozy in plaid.

name: Dina
description: Fierce and loyal, Dina was a street-smart sweetheart with a warrior's heart. Pointy ears, a cropped tail, and a no-nonsense attitude—especially with cats—but to her family, she was pure love in a black coat.
